insert into PredictionAccuracy (affectedByWaitStop, arrivalDepartureTime, directionId, predictedTime, predictionAccuracyMsecs, predictionReadTime, predictionSource, routeId, stopId, tripId, vehicleId, routeShortName)
select p.affectedByWaitStop, ad.time as arrivalDepartureTime, ad.directionId, p.predictionTime as predictedTime, datediff('ms', ad.time, p.predictionTime) as predictionAccuracyMsecs, p.avlTime as predictionReadTime, 'Transitime' as predictionSource, p.routeId, p.stopId, p.tripId, p.vehicleId, ad.routeShortName from Predictions p join ArrivalsDepartures ad on (p.gtfsStopSeq = ad.gtfsStopSeq and p.tripId = ad.tripId and p.vehicleId = ad.vehicleId and p.avlTime <= ad.avlTime and p.isArrival = ad.isArrival) where p.creationTime between :start and :end
select predictionAccuracyMsecs/1000 accuracy from PredictionAccuracy where datediff('ss', predictionReadTime, predictedTime) between :minPredLength and :maxPredLength order by accuracy asc
select predictionAccuracyMsecs, datediff('ms', predictionReadTime, predictedTime) from PredictionAccuracy
